name: A Walk in the Woods: VR
summary:
Are you quarantined at home - getting lazy and bored? Throw your beer and chips aside! Put on your VR helmet and go for a walk in the summer forest!
P.S. And if you use a pine scent freshener, the effect will be twice as strong)

Evening. Forest. A relaxing walk...

There are no monsters, no riddles, no need to defeat anyone or chase after anyone here - - it is not that type of game. It is a virtual escape where you can hide from the monotonous daily routine and enjoy the nature.
